jobTitle: Data Modeler- Fixed Income Technology- Hedge Fund
jobDescription: Duties include: Development of Fixed Income Portfolio Management and Accounting systems Implementation and monitoring of accounting and financial reporting systems Work on data integration and reporting Integrate portfolio management system with accounting and order management systems Implementation of hedging and pricing models Create customized risk management analytics The Candidate must have: Quantitative/Computer Science Bachelor s degree 3+ years of software engineering experience with a capital markets firm Strong SQL skills Advanced Excel/VBA coding skills Experience with Jira and Confluence Business Intelligence tools like Tableau A passion for coding and a desire to leverage these skills in collaborate and supporting environment Must want to work in fast paced quick thinking challenging work environment Keywords: SQL, Developer Excel, VBA, SQL, SSIS, Portfolio Management Systems, Risk Software, Accounting, Reports, Tableau, Jira, Confluence Refer to Job #23079 and email MS Word attached resume to Jim Geiger, ...@analyticrecruiting.com or register online at www.analyticrecruiting.com choosing Jim Geiger as your contact recruiter. A Los Angeles based Hedge Fund is looking for a Data Analyst with strong Data Modeling and SQL skills to support the firm's middle and back office treasury, accounting and portfolio management systems.
